mapper.sql: select feed_no, member_no, group_no, title, content, create_date, view_count from nm_feed
mapper.insert: insert into nm_feed( group_no, member_no, title, content ) values( #{groupNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content} )
mapper.select:
select f.feed_no, f.member_no, f.title, f.create_date, f.view_count, p.feed_photo_no, p.feed_photo_file from nm_feed f
inner join nm_feed_photo p on f.feed_no= p.feed_no
order by f.feed_no desc
mapper.update: update nm_feed set group_no=#{groupNo}, member_no=#{memberNo}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} where feed_no=#{feedNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from nm_feed_like where feed_no = #{feedNo} and rec_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from ex_rec where board_no = #{no} and rec_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ex_rec where board_no = #{no}
